attributes.action: Stop funding the Russian War Machine
attributes.additional_details: With a power supply shortage we may have to endure rolling blackouts, we may have to reopen old power stations, we may have to ration power, we may have to get creative in reducing power demands. All of these are achievable and will have the support of the nation. All of these pale into insignificance when compared to the suffering right now of millions of innocent people. Russia is trying to wipe an entire nation off the face of the earth. It does not even recognise Ukraine as a sovereign state.
attributes.background: An immediate cease of all gas, oil, petroleum and minerals from Russia. The money we use to buy these items is funding their war effort.

rejection.details:
We currently have the following petitions open which you might like to sign:

Ban all imports of Russian oil and gas immediately
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/610289

Full embargo of Russian imports in lieu of active military support in Ukraine
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609457

Place the strictest possible sanctions on Russia until it withdraws from Ukraine.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609428
